name: trash
description: Move files to trash instead of delete them

scripts.posttest: bin/trash -r cli-hide-valid -o "properties: false, maxlen: 0, debug: false, vars: false, passfail: false, unparam: false, stupid: false" -p "describe,it" -R example/ lib/ test/trash_lib.js test/trash_bin.js
